title: Facilities for physically handicapped persons
context: [ยง286-9 Facilities for physically handicapped persons.] The state director of transportation, under the director&rsquo;s authority dealing with highway design, construction, and maintenance and the director&rsquo;s authority dealing with pedestrian safety, shall provide that appropriate facilities be constructed at certain street locations for the use of physically handicapped persons. [L 1969, c 260, ยง2; am L Sp 1977 1st, c 20, ยง12; gen ch 1985]
